briefTitle: A PK Study Comparing VeraCept vs. ParaGard Intrauterine Devices (IUDs)

outcomeMeasures.title: Relative Maximum Observed Total Serum Copper Concentration of VeraCept vs ParaGard (Cmax)
outcomeMeasures.description: Assess the relative bioavailability of observed systemic copper from VeraCept versus ParaGard based on Cmax

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Serum Concentration of Copper for VeraCept vs. ParaGard (Cmean)
outcomeMeasures.description: Assess the relative bioavailability of observed systemic copper from VeraCept versus ParaGard based on Cmean

outcomeMeasures.title: Maximum Serum Concentration of Copper for VeraCept vs. ParaGard (AUC0-56)
outcomeMeasures.description: Assess the maximum relative bioavailability of observed systemic serum levels of copper from VeraCept versus ParaGard based on AUC0-56

outcomeMeasures.title: Baseline-corrected Maximum Total Serum Copper Concentration of VeraCept vs. ParaGard (Cmax)
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the relative bioavailability of baseline-corrected maximum total serum copper concentration of from the VeraCept IUD versus ParaGard based on Cmax

outcomeMeasures.title: Baseline-corrected Mean Total Serum Copper Concentration of VeraCept vs. ParaGard (Cmean)
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the relative bioavailability of baseline-corrected mean total serum copper concentration of VeraCept IUD versus ParaGard based on Cmean

outcomeMeasures.title: Baseline-Corrected Maximum Serum Concentration of Copper for VeraCept vs. ParaGard (AUC0-56)
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the relative bioavailability of baseline-corrected total serum copper from the VeraCept IUD versus ParaGard based on AUC0-56 days

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Serum Copper Levels of VeraCept vs. ParaGard Compared to Normal Copper Levels
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the total serum copper levels within each treatment relative to the normal range (49 to 184 µg/dL).

outcomeMeasures.title: Long-term Stability of Copper Levels as Determined by Cmax - VeraCept Only
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the long-term stability of copper levels following insertion of the VeraCept IUD

outcomeMeasures.title: Long-term Stability of Copper Levels as Determined by Cmean - VeraCept Only
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the long-term stability of copper levels following insertion of the VeraCept IUD
